'''Ben King''' is a patient whose allergies and asthma were treated with alternative therapies.

==History==
Ben came into the practice to see Pete, who used alternative therapies for Ben's asthma and allergies, which were severe. Pete used acupuncture to treat him, while Ben tried to set him up with his mother.

Ben came in to the practice with his mom. He'd called her from a friend's house saying he had trouble swallowing. By the time they arrived, he was having trouble breathing. Pete gave him a shot of adrenaline to help him breathe. Ben, Pete, and Lisa later spent time together happily. ''("[[Do the Right Thing]]")''

Pete told Lisa that Ben seemed to have no residual damage from his asthma attacks. ''("[[What You Do for Love]]")''

When Pete ended things with Lisa, Pete wanted to keep Ben as a patient because he didn't want the breakup to affect him. Lisa decided otherwise. ''("[[What You Do for Love]]")''

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He set his mother up with [[Pete Wilder]] because he liked him.
